import React from "react"; import '../bootstrap.min.css' import '../css/upload.css' import {useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify' import "react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css" import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { context } from "./Context"; export const View=()=>{ const details=useContext(context) return(


Pics World





{(details.length==0)?

No Pics Found



:details.map((x,index)=>


Title : {x.Title}

Category : {x.Category}

Posted By : {x.PostedBy}

Posted Date : {x.PostedDate}



)}
) }
